author: brent.allsop
content:
I’m finally carving out some time to work on the EIP Single Source of Truth stuff:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hUpMQh9gA5z3WSDvXKqU_CS6g3Y0hugJZHDYQdKxot8/edit

One of the proposed items was:
“Remove the meta EIP information from the eips repository
Move the data in EIP 1 to a page on eips.ethereum.org”
This idea originated with <@!301186049323958275>, but it is my understanding that we agreed we were not going to do this?
So I’m going to remove this from the Proposal list, unless anyone disagrees.
